Mad's Thought for the Day doc_madbezos 1-Apr-12 07:35 am I have had an epiphany. I have come to the realization that my unwarranted attacks on other posters have led to the deterioration of this message board. As a result, it is time for me to make a decision that should restore harmony and brainy discourse to this board. I have decided to no longer post messages on this board. I do this with a heavy heart. I shall delete my bookmark for this board and return to the comfortable surroundings of a life devoid of real-world experiences in the halls of academia. I go in peace.

Topic.Title: EBAY RAISING FEES AGAIN UNDER GUISE OF LOWERING THEM

Message.Msg: in business to consumer ecommerce, amazon is ebay's biggest competitor. people don't need same day delivery. shoppers are procastinators. people use the internet for research and compare prices and then buy. why business don't sell on ebay, cause it waste a lot of time and it cost 20% more for merchants selling on internet rather than cash and carry on costco. ebay and amazon good for liquidating old stock that doesn't sell or if merchant needs cash.
